title: Fokus420
author: Fokus420
content: Hi Everyone, I invite you to view this interview with Matt Morgan, Co-Founder of Cannaland. Cannaverse Technologies has created CANNALAND, which will become the worldâ€™s first virtual cannabis themed community and marketplace globally, by appealing to Cannabis Enthusiasts and the Canna-Curious. CANNALAND will embrace all aspects of the cannabis industry, B2B and B2C, including cultivation, infusion, manufacturing, packaging, retail and dispensaries, and will include a content infrastructure designed to immerse consumers in a digital experience focusing on ecommerce, entertainment and gaming, personalization, education, latest medical research and insights. CANNALAND Token (CNLT) will provide transactional utility within CANNALAND with the aspiration of becoming THE preferred cannabis token accepted wherever cannabis is sold around the world.You can look the team in the whitepaper, great professional background. Website is www.cannaland.xyzLet's be blunt about Cannaland w. Matt Morganhttps://youtu.be/C8rsbY8pLIs
